Classic.nama: Chuck Taylor All Star Classic Low - Red
Classic.detail: We could tell you that it’s the OG basketball shoe, created over 100 years ago. Or that the design has largely stayed the same, because why mess with a good thing. Or how it became the unofficial sneaker of all your favorite artists and musicians, who each made it their own. Yeah, we could share a lot of stories, but the one that matters most isnt ours—its yours

Kids.nama: Chuck Taylor All Star Ultra Easy-On, Kids - Strom Wind
Kids.detail: The Chuck Taylor All Star Ultra is a lightweight style inspired by the original All Star‚ now sized down for kids. Chuck Taylor classics like the star ankle patch and woven tongue label pay homage to the original, and exagerrated midsole design adds newness.
